message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $90 is a bit higher than I'm looking to spend right now.  I'd be willing to pay $80 for it. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for 85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
